cast.name: 卢多维卡·纳斯提 Ludovica Nasti
布鲁诺·伯茨多 Bruno Bozzetto

writer.name: 瓦利亚·桑泰拉 Valia Santella

this_title: La storia del Frank e della Nina
introduction: Facciamo tutti centro “is a story about everyday extraordinary people, with silent narration, a revolutionary realist and a relentless dreamer enthused about the future”, according to a statement released by the production team. It’s a story about the love and friendship between 3 children – Gollum, Frank and Nina – who are looking for their place in the world, for freedom, and for affirmation of their own uniqueness, of their way of experiencing reality and of an anarchic love in a romantically rendered Milan, a city of dreams and adventure for those like them who live outside of the outer circle, in commuter towns, but it’s also a city of harsh and complex realities which people are forced to contend with.
foreign_title: La storia del Frank e della Nina
